author: Kristina Peterson
title: Trump Expected to Threaten Veto of Farm Bill Without Tighter Work Requirements
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump is expected to tell senior lawmakers in a meeting Wednesday that he will veto the farm bill if it doesn’t include tighter work requirements for people receiving food stamps, according to two people familiar with his deliberations.
That stance would immediately intensify the fight around work requirements, the most controversial element of the farm bill, and start a new debate over spending on federal safety-net programs ahead of November’s midterm elections.
...
